LanguageData.VFE_IndustrialGenerators.label: industrial generators
LanguageData.VFE_IndustrialGenerators.description: Build industrial-grade generators, capable of storing significantly more fuel and producing higher power.
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedBatteries.label: advanced battery
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedBatteries.description: Build spacertech batteries, capable of efficiently storing large amounts of energy.
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedPowerSources.label: advanced power sources
LanguageData.VFE_AdvancedPowerSources.description: Construct spacertech green power generators, including advanced solar panels and wind turbines.
LanguageData.VFE_NuclearPower.label: nuclear power
LanguageData.VFE_NuclearPower.description: The ultimate power generation method, nuclear power is as sufficient as it is deadly.
LanguageData.VFE_TidalPower.label: tidal power
LanguageData.VFE_TidalPower.description: Build tidal generators on water to produce a large volume of sustainable green energy.
